message: Workload has been really heavy lately | My manager tries to help but we still get too many urgent tasks | Maybe we can plan sprints better
I feel comfortable with my current workload | The team has been very supportive | I appreciate the hybrid work flexibility
Sometimes communication between HR and other departments could be clearer | I feel we can improve coordination on policy updates | Meetings are frequent but productive
Targets are quite challenging this quarter | Management is supportive but deadlines are tight | Would love more training sessions on new tools
Office environment feels much better after the renovation | Workload manageable | Team morale is high this month
